author: serge
msg: Changed to use different bounce system (better complies with API).

author: serge
msg: New mailet to handle aliasing from one address to another.

author: serge
msg: Big shift away from TimeServer system to custom implementing spool system.  This mailet spawns 1 (or multiple) spool threads that check the outgoing spool repository for messages that are ready to be delivered.  Service method just stores mail object directly into outgoing spool and returns rather than attempting delivery... storage in outgoing spool will trigger the delivery spool thread immediately if it isn't already busy.

author: serge
msg: Removed commented out code and added verifyMailAddresses method which makes sure a mailet and matcher return only MailAddress objects in the recipients Collection.

author: serge
msg: Added last update field (for use in spool repository)
